DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of our study was to which determine factors, those measured by ultrasound and also demographic and clinical factors (age, number of previous pregnancies, abortions and deliveries) predict outcome of medical treatment for early pregnancy failure. Our hypothesis was that gestational sac volume predicts outcome of medical treatment for early pregnancy failure.
DOC.brief_title: Early Pregnancy Failure: Factors Affecting Successful Medical Termination Treatment
DOC.criteria: Crown rump length (CRL) is appropriate to less than 12 weeks.
